headline: Stacy DeRiso Appointed Initiative Brand President to Lead Agency Globally
summary: NEW YORK, June 18, 2025--IPG Mediabrands, the media holding company within the Interpublic Group of Companies (NYSE: IPG), today announced the appointment of Stacy DeRiso as Brand President of Initiative, leading the agency globally.
